programme.title: A Taxi Driver [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: During the Gwangju Uprising, a Seoul taxi driver and a journalist join citizens' fight for freedom in 1980 South Korea.

programme.title: The Roundup [English Dub]
programme.desc: Four years after the sweeping operation of Garibong-dong, Detective Ma Seok-do and his unit have an extradition mission - to transfer a surrendered suspect from Vietnam. When Ma and Team Leader Jeon meet him, he seems fearful of something. Ma and Jeon find out that he gets involved in a kidnap/murder case: the victim is a young businessman whose father is the giant loan shark in Seoul. The leader of the crime, Kang Hae-sang, is responsible for several other kidnap/murder cases targeting Koreans in Vietnam. Ma and his colleagues start to chase after Kang before he commits more horrible crimes.

programme.title: Boyhood : E03 [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Coupang Play Original Series! 1989 Chungcheongnam-do, Onyang's loser Byung-tae has a one-of-a-lifetime goal of living without getting hit and becomes Buyeo's toughest overnight

programme.title: Boyhood : E04 [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Coupang Play Original Series! 1989 Chungcheongnam-do, Onyang's loser Byung-tae has a one-of-a-lifetime goal of living without getting hit and becomes Buyeo's toughest overnight

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting [English Dub]
programme.desc: During transport, a group of hardened criminals stages a jailbreak that quickly escalates into a bloody, all-out riot.

programme.title: RAILROAD TIGERS [English Dub]
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Pushing Hands [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Having just moved from Beijing, elderly tai chi master Mr. Chu (Sihung Lung) struggles to adjust to life in New York, living with his Americanized son Alex (Ye-tong Wang). Chu immediately butts heads with his put-upon white daughter-in-law, Martha (Deb Snyder), a writer who seems to blame him for her own paralyzing inability to focus. But when Chu begins teaching tai chi at a local school, his desire to make a meaningful connection comes to fruition in the most unexpected of ways. PUSHING HANDS is the debut film from Oscar-winning director Ang Lee, forming the first chapter in his 'Father Knows Best' trilogy, which depicts the tensions between the traditional Confucian values of the older generation and the realities of modern life. Co-written by collaborator James Schamus, PUSHING HANDS was selected by the 1992 Berlin International Film Festival and won three Golden Horse Awards, paving the way for Lee's worldwide success with films such as CROUCHING TIGER, HIDDEN DRAGON and BROKEBACK MOUNTAIN. Presented in a new 2K restoration.

programme.title: Dirty Money [English Dub]
programme.desc: Two detectives in need; Myung-deuk looks after gang and takes bribes for his sick daughter; Dong-hyeok helps Myung-deuk to settle his gambling debts. One day they hear an information that Chinese gang is shipping a big amount of cash abroad and decide to steal it for themselves. But things go wrong and they're now chased both by police and Chinese gang.

programme.title: RIDE ON [English Dub]
programme.desc: A washed-up stuntman and his stunt horse become an overnight social media sensation when their real-life fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: THE ASSASSINS [English Dub]
programme.desc: In the year 198, Cao Cao, Prime Minister of the Han Dynasty, ventured to the east and defeated China's greatest warrior Lu Bu, terrifying every ambitious warlord across the country. Several years later, after taking the Han Emperor under his wing, Cao crowns himself King of Wei. He built a magnificent Bronze Sparrow Island to symbolize his power and rumors spread that he would replace the Emperor. Meanwhile, young lovers Mu Shun and Ling Ju are taken from a prison camp to a hidden tomb, where they spend five cruel years together, training as assassins for a secret mission. In the year 220 astronomical signs predict dramatic change. As a result, Cao's son Cao Pi and Cao's followers urge Cao to become the new Emperor - but unknown opposing forces plot against him.

programme.desc: Coupang Play Original Series! 1989 Chungcheongnam-do, Onyang's loser Byung-tae has a one-of-a-lifetime goal of living without getting hit and becomes Buyeo's toughest overnight

programme.title: Road to Boston [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Jang Yun Jung and Do Kyung Wan are on a mission to find new singing talents! The show invites gifted vocalists who have not yet made their mark in the industry to a lesson with Jang. She teaches them the basics and corrects any bad habits they may have. Experience the magic of Dr. Jang, the empress of trot.

programme.title: The Thieves [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Master thieves target a casino's $20M diamond, facing vaults, cops, and betrayals for the ultimate score.

programme.title: The Suspect [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Dong-chul seeks truth after family's murder. Framed for boss's death, he'll start a war for answers.
